title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 360.3 - Service credit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 360.3 - Service credit

State Regulations

Employees of community colleges who have been employed
full-time for a school year, as defined in section
360.2
of this Part shall receive a
full year of service credit for such school year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
360.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
